__e: So I had a man out here recently to look at the furnace, and, Sheriff Truman, he wouldn't answer any of my questions about what happens when no one's here.
I didn't know it would be this Sheriff Truman.
I wrote a letter to the sheriff,
- New sheriff in town? - You, you...
But there's a new sheriff in town!
Well, let's just say a spot for town sheriff just opened up at this very moment.
You've been sheriff for about two minutes, and I'm already starting to hate you.
We been trying to get us a sheriff for a long time but we can't get nobody to take the job.
If a sheriff in a town like this says that's what happened, that's what happened.
This happened in your town, Sheriff Hood.
We knew they had Sheriff Hood. And that he'd be killed very quickly if we didn't act. - I see.
Sheriff Hood I attacked a man in town today.
Sheriff, you can't let them take us.
I mean, heck, Sheriff, you may have been the last one to see her.
You've got a job to do, where do you intend to begin?
He wanted me for sheriff, and I said no.
Sheriff, I don't know what part of hell they're from.
Show me an honest sheriff and I'll show you a man without money.
He was a good sheriff Doctor, and a very good father.
You care to share what else they told you? - Hey, dad? - Hey, I'm the sheriff, Maggie.
